metadata.title: CVE-2015-6609 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: libutils in Android before 5.1.1 LMY48X and 6.0 before 2015-11-01 allowsremote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service(memory corruption) via a crafted audio file, aka internal bug 22953624.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'abandoned').
